entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:03 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
